item.title: FrankO add a quote by Satchel Paige
item.description: "Don't pray when it rains if you don't pray when the sun shines." -- Satchel Paige

item.title: FrankO add a quote by Satchel Paige
item.description: "Ain’t no man can avoid being born average, but there ain’t no man got to be common." -- Satchel Paige

item.title: FrankO add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: FrankO add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: FrankO add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: FrankO add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "God created war so that Americans would learn geography." -- Mark Twain

item.title: FrankO add a quote by Aldo Leopold
item.description: "All conservation of wildness is self-defeating, for to cherish we must see and fondle, and when enough have seen and fondled, there is no wilderness left to cherish." -- Aldo Leopold

item.title: FrankO add a quote by Aldo Leopold
item.description: "Conservation is getting nowhere because it is incompatible with our Abrahamic concept of land. We abuse land because we regard it as a commodity belonging to us. When we see land as a community to which we belong, we may begin to use it with love and respect." -- Aldo Leopold

item.title: FrankO add a quote by Aldo Leopold
item.description: "The good life of any river may depend on the perception of its music; and the preservation of some music to perceive." -- Aldo Leopold

item.title: FrankO add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description:
"The way of love is not a subtle argument.
The door there is devastation.
Birds make great sky-circles of their freedom. How do they learn it?
They fall, and falling, they're given wings." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
